name: Weird Bird Pong
description:
Weird bird pong features you as a player hitting a weird looking bird toward another player, you have to hit the bird more than your opponent. no real birds harmed in the making of this game.

(After downloading game open it on processing 4, go to sketch, add file and insert "weirdbird.png" for the game to run as intended).

// credit goes to following link for game state reference https://openprocessing.org/sketch/1501911
